mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT phone as id, phone as phone, billing_key as cUid, DATE_FORMAT(next_order_date, "%Y-%m-%d") as nextdate FROM order_tbl where status = 1 and DATE_FORMAT(next_order_date, "%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(), "%Y-%m-%d") ORDER BY success_time desc) a GROUP BY phone
